terms.title: Terms of Service - TraviXO
terms.description: TraviXO terms of service and user agreement.

homepage.hero: Track Your Assets with QR Codes

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your fleet size. All plans include unlimited scans, QR code generation, and email support. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.

questions.question: What counts as an "asset"?
questions.answer: An asset is any piece of equipment you're tracking. This includes heavy machinery, tools, vehicles, containers anything with a QR code attached.

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes, upgrade or downgrade anytime. If you upgrade mid-month, we'll prorate the difference. If you downgrade, the new rate applies at your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes! Founding customers (first 20 companies) get a 2-month free pilot with up to 60 assets. After the pilot, you can choose any paid plan.

questions.question: Where is my data stored?
questions.answer: All data is hosted in EU datacenters (France) with full GDPR compliance. We never store data outside the EU.
